short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open current Google Maps view in Spotforest web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finally an easy way to open Google Maps view in Spotforest!

Seamless transition from Google Maps to Spotforest and Spottimett√§. Use this extension to get a floating button to Google maps. Button tap will switch to correct Spotforest web app based on viewed area and copy the view to Spotforest. If you don't have Spotforest app open, the button will open it in new tab with the current view.
